definitions.definition: Clinging fuzzy fluff that clings to fabric or accumulates in one's pockets or navel etc.
examples: Clean the lint out of the vacuum cleaner's filter.

definitions.definition: A fine material made by scraping cotton or linen cloth ; used for dressing wounds .
The fibrous coat of thick hairs covering the seeds of the cotton plant .

main_definition: Clinging fuzzy fluff that clings to fabric or accumulates in one's pockets or navel etc.
secondary_definitions: A fine material made by scraping cotton or linen cloth ; used for dressing wounds .
The fibrous coat of thick hairs covering the seeds of the cotton plant .
